definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: A few hundred cyclists have even braved the pot-holed roads for a "Tour de Timor" mountain-bike race.
sentences.chinese: 一场环帝汶自行车赛在凹凸不平的路上拉开帷幕。

sentences.english: China and Chinese Taipei split two gold medals in cycling.
sentences.chinese: 中国和中国台北队分割了自行车赛的两块金牌。

sentences.english: I told you a bit about my first Ironman bike for a reason…
sentences.chinese: 我回忆第一次大铁人赛自行车赛段是有原因的。

sentences.english: He has taken part in long-distance cycle races and run several marathons .
sentences.chinese: 他曾参加过远程自行车赛和好几个马拉松赛。

race of several days/many day competition
